Am 10.05.10 16:12, schrieb Jan Algermissen:

>> I am working on a Blog project where I use ATOM for representing feeds and blog posts. I have a set of draft posts and published posts. In order to change a draft post to a published post I need to "publish" it. How should I represent one such command in REST?
> 
> AtomPub has native support for that use case: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5023#section-13.1.1
> 
> Use <app:draft/> to mark the posting as draft and simply update the posting (without <app:draft/>) to have it published.

This would by a nice use case for the PATCH method. This way one could
avoid the re-transmission of the whole posting.

-billy.
